hero.title: Measure your carbon footprint on the web!
hero.subtitle: Every page you load consumes energy. Measure your footprint and act for a greener internet.

video.title: Install. Analyze. Save.
video.description: Reducing your site's impact also means reducing its footprint on the planet. Use GreenScore Web!
video.description_more: By registering, you will be able to consult dashboards of your consumption.

stats.title: Numbers that speak for themselves!
stats.users_desc: That's the number of internet users in 2025
stats.images_desc: That's the percentage of image weight on a website
stats.video_desc: tons of CO2 generated by video format alone
stats.reduction_desc: possible reduction in CO2 emissions by applying good eco-design practices!

greenscore.title: Understanding GreenScore
greenscore.description: GreenScore is an indicator that measures the environmental impact of a web page. It is based on several criteria related to energy consumption and the carbon footprint generated by the site.
greenscore.calc_desc: GreenScore calculation relies on the analysis of several key factors based on energy consumption:
greenscore.calc_conclusion: These values are then multiplied by the carbon intensity of the country where the plugin user is located, resulting in the final carbon footprint in grams of CO2 emitted (gCO2e).
greenscore.estimation: Please note: This calculation provides an estimate and not an exact measurement. Not all the data required for an accurate carbon footprint calculation is available. Nevertheless, these results enablecomparer efficacement of energy consumption between different web pages and identification of areas for improvement.

scale.title: GreenScore Scale
scale.description: GreenScore is awarded based on the calculated carbon footprint, according to the following grid:

s1.title: 1. Identity of the Data Controller
s1.content: The data controller for personal data is:
s1.li2: Address: 2 All√©e du Parc Montaury, 64600 Anglet, France

s2.title: 2. Collected Data
s2.s2_1_li1: When creating an account: first and last name or organization name, email address, password, SIRET number (if the user registers as an Organization).
s2.s2_1_li2: When using the plugin or web application: data related to your usage, such as chosen preferences or settings.

s3.title: 3. Purposes of Processing
s3.li1: Provide and improve the features of the web application and plugin.
s3.li3: Respond to your support or contact requests.
s3.li5: Comply with our legal and regulatory obligations.

s4.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
s4.li1: Performance of a contract, to provide services related to your account.
s4.li2: Our legitimate interest, to secure our services and improve their performance.
s4.li3: A legal obligation, to comply with applicable laws.

s5.title: 5. Data Sharing
s5.intro: Your data is never sold. We only share it with:
s5.li1: Our service providers (hosting, maintenance) as part of their mission.
s5.li2: Competent authorities, if required by law.
s5.outro: These third parties are required to ensure the confidentiality and security of your information.

s6.title: 6. Retention Period
s6.intro: Your personal data is kept as long as necessary for the purposes described above:
s6.li2: Logs and technical data: kept for 12 months.
s6.li3: Beyond that, data is deleted or anonymized.

s7.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
s7.p1: We use cookies to improve your browsing on the web application.
s7.p2: During your first visit, a banner informs you about the use of cookies. You can accept, refuse, or customize your preferences. If you block cookies, you will not be able to log in to the web application.

s8.title: 8. Your Rights
s8.intro: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
s8.li1: Access: obtain a copy of the data we hold.
s8.li2: Rectification: correct inaccurate or incomplete information.
s8.li3: Deletion: request the erasure of your data, unless legally obligated otherwise.
s8.li4: Objection: refuse certain processing (e.g., direct marketing).
s8.li5: Portability: receive your data in a structured format.
s8.li6: Complaint: contact the CNIL (France) if you believe your rights are not respected.
s8.outro: To exercise your rights, contact us at:

s9.title: 9. Data Security
s9.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, loss, or alteration.

s10.title: 10. Changes to Privacy Policy
s10.content: We may update this Privacy Policy to reflect changes in our practices or for legal reasons. The updated version will be published on our web application.

s11.title: 11. Contact
s11.intro: For any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, contact us:
s11.li1: Address: 2 All√©e du Parc Montaury, 64600 Anglet, France

s1.title: 1. Object
s1.intro: The Terms of Use govern the use of:
s1.outro: These services aim to provide tools and analytics to assess the carbon footprint of online activities.

s2.title: 2. Acceptance of Terms
s2.content: By using the web application or the plugin, you acknowledge having read, understood, and accepted these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any of the terms, please do not use our services.

s3.title: 3. Access to Services
s3.s3_1_content: Access to the application is free. Some specific sections or services may require creating a user account.
s3.s3_2_content: Access to the plugin is free. Some features are linked to the application and may therefore require a user account.
s3.s3_3_outro: All costs related to this equipment and connections are the responsibility of the users.

s4.title: 4. User Account
s4.intro: To access certain features, you will need to:
s4.li1: create an account on the application or via the plugin,
s4.li3: maintain the confidentiality of your credentials.
s4.outro: You are solely responsible for activity conducted under your account.

s5.title: 5. Authorized Use
s5.intro: By using the web application and the plugin, you agree to comply with:
s5.li2: the rights of other users and GreenScore Web.
s5.forbidden_li1: exploit the services for fraudulent or harmful purposes,
s5.forbidden_li2: disassemble, decompile, or attempt to bypass the security measures of the plugin or web application.

s6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
s6.p1: All contents of the application and plugin (logos, texts, codes, images, etc.) are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use them without prior written permission from GreenScore Web.
s6.p2: Some images used on the application and plugin come from Flaticon and are used in accordance with their terms of use. These images are protected by copyright, and their reproduction or redistribution is prohibited without permission from Flaticon or the author.

s7.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
s7.intro: We strive to ensure quality service, but we do not guarantee:
s7.outro: GreenScore Web declines all liability for indirect damages or damages related to inappropriate use of the web application or plugin.

s8.title: 8. Collection and Use of Personal Data
s8.content: Data collected via the application and plugin are processed in accordance with our
s8.content_end: . We are committed to protecting your information and respecting your privacy rights.

s9.title: 9. Changes to Terms
s9.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Modifications will take effect immediately upon publication on the web application or in the plugin. It is your responsibility to check these Terms regularly.

s10.title: 10. Duration and Termination
s10.p1: The Terms apply from your first use of the services. You may stop using the application and plugin at any time.
s10.p2: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access in case of non-compliance with the Terms.

s11.title: 11. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
s11.p1: These Terms are governed by French law.
s11.p2: In case of dispute, the competent courts of Bayonne shall have sole jurisdiction.

s12.title: 12. Contact
s12.intro: For any questions or complaints regarding these Terms, please contact us:
s12.address: Address: 2 All√©e du Parc Montaury, 64600 Anglet, France

score.E: This site has a considerable environmental impact ‚ôªÔ∏è
score.F: This site is very energy-intensive, it's a real challenge for the planet üî•

infos_greenscore.description: The environmental impact is evaluated based on page complexity, data weight, and number of requests.

advice.optimize_sql: Optimize your SQL queries to avoid unnecessary operations.
advice.minify_files: Minify and compress CSS and JavaScript files.
advice.reduce_http_requests: Reduce HTTP requests by bundling files.
advice.use_webp: Use modern image formats like WebP.
advice.lazy_loading: Adopt lazy loading for images and scripts.
advice.avoid_loops: Avoid infinite loops or unnecessary server-side calculations.
advice.eco_servers: Deploy your application on eco-friendly servers.
advice.use_cdn: Use CDNs to distribute your static content.
advice.reduce_resource_usage: Monitor and reduce memory and CPU usage in your scripts.
advice.efficient_algorithms: Design more efficient algorithms to save resources.
advice.reduce_cookies: Reduce cookie size and limit their usage.
advice.adapted_db: Choose databases adapted to your needs to avoid overload.
advice.cloud_solutions: Opt for cloud solutions with a reduced carbon footprint.
advice.disable_logs: Disable logs in production mode to reduce load.
advice.offline_reports: Generate reports or analyses offline if possible.
advice.resource_audit: Conduct regular audits to detect unused resources.
advice.adjust_brightness: Adjust your screen brightness to save energy.
advice.close_unused_tabs: Close unused tabs in your browser.
advice.block_ads: Use an ad blocker to reduce network load.
advice.eco_search_engines: Prioritize eco-friendly search engines like Ecosia.
advice.clear_cache: Regularly clear your browser cache and cookies.
advice.limit_extensions: Limit the use of resource-heavy browser extensions.
advice.data_saver_mode: Prioritize data saver mode on mobile devices.
advice.mobile_optimized_sites: Visit mobile-optimized sites to reduce data consumption.
advice.low_res_video: Watch videos in low resolution if high definition is not necessary.
advice.logout_unused: Log out of unused accounts while browsing.
advice.lightweight_browser: Use a lightweight browser like Firefox Focus for simple tasks.
advice.wifi_over_data: Download content over Wi-Fi instead of using mobile data.
advice.plan_searches: Plan your web searches to avoid multiplying requests.
advice.text_mode: Prioritize text versions of articles when possible.
advice.share_links: Share resources (documents, videos) via links rather than attachments.
advice.disable_push: Disable non-essential push notifications on websites.
advice.close_background_apps: Close apps running in the background to save resources.
advice.default_dev: Prioritize sustainable tools and workflows to reduced developer footprint.
advice.default_user: Adopt responsible digital habits to reduce energy consumption.
